item.title: Content Creator Needed for Wellness Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creator/dietitian to film 2, 30 second 9x16 assets for a Health & Wellness Brand that sells Vitamins & Supplements.

You don't have to be an expert on the topics, as we will provide talking points for you!

General Needs:
Videos: 2 total
Aspect Ratio: 9x16
Time/length: 30 - 60 seconds preferred

Creator responsible for:
Shooting video clips
Editing video clips together
Recording any VOs

Budget: $800
Posted On: June 28, 2024 17:39 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Content Creation, Video Editing & Production
Skills: Content Creation, Video Editing & Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
